plot outline: Watch the full movie, Makkala Bhagya, only on Eros Now. Makkala Bhagya is a 1976 Indian Kannada film, directed by K S L Swamy and produced by K Vittal Kumar, K V Honnappa. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Bharathi, K. S. Ashwath and Dwarakish in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar.
title: Makkala Bhagya
plot: Watch the full movie, _Makkala Bhagya_ (qv), only on Eros Now. _Makkala Bhagya_ (qv) is a 1976 Indian Kannada film, directed by K S L Swamy and produced by K Vittal Kumar, K V Honnappa. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, Bharathi, K. S. Ashwath and Dwarakish in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya Bhaskar.
